{/* Header Section */}

Inexperienced Class A Drivers

Drive for RGM Family

{/* Apply Today Button */} Apply Today
{/* Main Content Section */}

RECENT DRIVING SCHOOL GRADUATE OR LIMITED CLASS A EXPERIENCE? No problem.

RGM Family offers an orientation and flatbed training program just for you! We've been training apprentice drivers for nearly 30 years.

Orientation & Training

Orientation is two weeks at one of our training facilities located in Des Moines, Iowa or Columbia, South Carolina. Orientation is followed by five weeks over-the-road (OTR) with a Driver Trainer (4 weeks if you have an Automatic Transmission restriction on your CDL). Home time is important to us, so we pair you with a trainer that lives within 150 miles of your home.

  • Your first 7 days (Mon-Sun) is classroom instruction and hands-on load securement training.
  • Your remaining 5 days (Mon-Fri) are equipment familiarization and OTR training.
  • Apprentice drivers are paid $650/week during training.

Why RGM Family?

  • Weekend Home Time
  • Industry-Leading Pay (first-year drivers can earn $100,000+/year)
  • Top Quality Equipment
  • Flatbed Training with Safety Experts

Military Veterans

Visit our Veteran Page for special programs and benefits.

Employee-Owned

Very few companies in the U.S. are Employee-Owned. RGM Family is proud to be one of them.

Orientation Facilities

Training facilities in Des Moines, Iowa and Columbia, South Carolina.

{/* Apply Today Button Again */}
Apply Today
